about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.assesses: This sign shows one type of: | This sign shows one type of: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign warns drivers that another road crosses the highway ahead.

comment.text: Intersection.
Road curve.
Right turn.
Intersection.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign warns drivers that another road crosses the highway ahead.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates that there could be traffic merging from the right, so drivers should prepare to allow traffic to safely merge.

suggestedAnswer.text: Cars in the right lane must slow down.

comment.text: Cars in the right lane must slow down.
No left turn.
Merge.
Merge.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates that there could be traffic merging from the right, so drivers should prepare to allow traffic to safely merge.

hasPart.name: If you are being followed too closely on a two-lane road:

about.name: If you are being followed too closely on a two-lane road:

hasPart.assesses: If you are being followed too closely on a two-lane road: | If you are being followed too closely on a two-lane road: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: If you are being followed too closely by another driver, merge into a different lane. If there is no lane available for merging, wait until the road ahead is clear and slowly reduce your speed. This will encourage the tailgater to drive around you.

suggestedAnswer.text: Reduce your speed slowly to encourage the tailgater to drive around you.

comment.text: Reduce your speed slowly to encourage the tailgater to drive around you.

suggestedAnswer.text: Speed up to increase the distance between you and the other car.

comment.text: Speed up to increase the distance between you and the other car.

suggestedAnswer.text: Apply your brakes to slow down, then resume your original speed.

comment.text: Apply your brakes to slow down, then resume your original speed.

acceptedAnswer.text: Reduce your speed slowly to encourage the tailgater to drive around you.

comment.text: Reduce your speed slowly to encourage the tailgater to drive around you.

answerExplanation.text: If you are being followed too closely by another driver, merge into a different lane. If there is no lane available for merging, wait until the road ahead is clear and slowly reduce your speed. This will encourage the tailgater to drive around you.

comment.text: If you are being followed too closely on a two-lane road: | If you are being followed too closely by another driver, merge into a different lane. If there is no lane available for merging, wait until the road ahead is clear and slowly reduce your speed. This will encourage the tailgater to drive around you.

hasPart.name: A flashing yellow traffic signal at an intersection means:

about.name: A flashing yellow traffic signal at an intersection means:

hasPart.assesses: A flashing yellow traffic signal at an intersection means: | A flashing yellow traffic signal at an intersection means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A flashing yellow signal means "proceed with caution." You should slow down and be alert before entering the upcoming intersection and must yield to any pedestrians, bicycles, or vehicles in the intersection; however, you do not have to stop.

suggestedAnswer.text: You should treat the signal like a stop sign.

comment.text: You should treat the signal like a stop sign.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop. Yield to all cross traffic before crossing in the intersection.

comment.text: Stop. Yield to all cross traffic before crossing in the intersection.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down and be alert at the upcoming intersection.

comment.text: Slow down and be alert at the upcoming intersection.

acceptedAnswer.text: Slow down and be alert at the upcoming intersection.

comment.text: Slow down and be alert at the upcoming intersection.

answerExplanation.text: A flashing yellow signal means "proceed with caution." You should slow down and be alert before entering the upcoming intersection and must yield to any pedestrians, bicycles, or vehicles in the intersection; however, you do not have to stop.

comment.text: A flashing yellow traffic signal at an intersection means: | A flashing yellow signal means "proceed with caution." You should slow down and be alert before entering the upcoming intersection and must yield to any pedestrians, bicycles, or vehicles in the intersection; however, you do not have to stop.

hasPart.name: Which lane must you be in before making a left turn from a one-way street?

about.name: Which lane must you be in before making a left turn from a one-way street?

hasPart.assesses: Which lane must you be in before making a left turn from a one-way street? | Which lane must you be in before making a left turn from a one-way street? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When making any turn, turn from the lane closest to the direction you wish to travel into the first available legal lane. If you are making a left turn from a one-way street, this means that you would make the turn from the lane nearest to the left curb.

suggestedAnswer.text: The lane nearest the left curb.

comment.text: The lane nearest the left curb.

suggestedAnswer.text: The lane nearest the center of the street.

comment.text: The lane nearest the center of the street.

suggestedAnswer.text: The lane nearest the right curb.

comment.text: The lane nearest the right curb.

acceptedAnswer.text: The lane nearest the left curb.

comment.text: The lane nearest the left curb.

answerExplanation.text: When making any turn, turn from the lane closest to the direction you wish to travel into the first available legal lane. If you are making a left turn from a one-way street, this means that you would make the turn from the lane nearest to the left curb.

comment.text: Which lane must you be in before making a left turn from a one-way street? | When making any turn, turn from the lane closest to the direction you wish to travel into the first available legal lane. If you are making a left turn from a one-way street, this means that you would make the turn from the lane nearest to the left curb.

hasPart.name: Stopping distances and the severity of collisions:

about.name: Stopping distances and the severity of collisions:

hasPart.assesses: Stopping distances and the severity of collisions: | Stopping distances and the severity of collisions: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Excessive vehicle speed can have disastrous effects. As a vehicle's speed increases, the potential impact of a collision also increases, elevating the possibility of serious injury and death. Increase your following distance as your speed increases to ensure that you will be able to stop safely if needed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Decrease as a vehicle's speed increases.

comment.text: Decrease as a vehicle's speed increases.

suggestedAnswer.text: Are not affected by a vehicle's speed.

comment.text: Are not affected by a vehicle's speed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Increase as a vehicle's speed increases.

comment.text: Increase as a vehicle's speed increases.

acceptedAnswer.text: Increase as a vehicle's speed increases.

comment.text: Increase as a vehicle's speed increases.

answerExplanation.text: Excessive vehicle speed can have disastrous effects. As a vehicle's speed increases, the potential impact of a collision also increases, elevating the possibility of serious injury and death. Increase your following distance as your speed increases to ensure that you will be able to stop safely if needed.

comment.text: Stopping distances and the severity of collisions: | Excessive vehicle speed can have disastrous effects. As a vehicle's speed increases, the potential impact of a collision also increases, elevating the possibility of serious injury and death. Increase your following distance as your speed increases to ensure that you will be able to stop safely if needed.
